alert.note: Alert for Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 6:26AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Patchy Areas of Dense Fog This Morning... Patchy areas of fog have developed across portions of South Florida ahead of a cold front this morning. Visibilities are likely to be reduced to around a mile in general, with localized areas experiencing reduced visibilities less than one-half of a mile at times over the next few hours. Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County
